game.name: Death In Your Dice
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Can you outwit fate when your turn comes? From now on, all you care about is the game of dice and its consequences. Observe, investigate, act, defend yourself. Time is ticking away, but death will not wait.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Can you outwit fate when your turn comes? From now on, all you care about is the game of dice and its consequences. Observe, investigate, act, defend yourself. Time is ticking away, but death will not wait.
